extendedInfo.description: OS Monitor is a tool for monitoring your Android system.It offers the following information.- Processes - monitor all processes.- Connections - display every network connection.- Misc - monitor battery, processors, network interfaces and file system.- Messages - search dmesg or logcat in real-time.  Support Languages:> Chinese> English> Hebrew (Thanks to Arthur)Set CPU functions has been added back, if you don't know what you are doing, please don't use this function, otherwise, you could brick your phone!% if you enter SetCPU function, but frequency or governor is empty, it means your CPU couldn't be online, please reboot your phone and try again.Notice: if you are older device like Android 1.5~2.2, you are still able to download old version from https://code.google.com/p/android-os-monitor/downloads/list or search "OS Monitor (Legacy)" on Google Play.OS Monitor still is a open source project, if you would like to support, please purchase "Donate to OS Monitor" app.% Thanks everyone who help to send crash report!!

reviews.title: Not updated
reviews.comment: The What\'s New describes features which haven\'t been added. The app is exactly the same as before! Oh well. Better than your usual task killers. This actually shows you what is happening.
reviews.author: Aden Asquith

reviews.comment: Definitely one of the better apps for system management
reviews.author: Benjamin Lee

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Nice layout, though there shouldn\'t be an exit button (home or back should do so)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good.
reviews.comment: I can now see what apps are eating my cpu and memory. Nice one!
reviews.author: Michael Anderson

reviews.comment: Essential app
reviews.author: Roman Kamyk

reviews.comment: My go-to tool when my phone starts acting wonky
reviews.author: Tom Coyle

reviews.title: Nice program.
reviews.comment: Use it to check cpu usage. Very light and stable.
reviews.author: Bryan Co

reviews.title: Best ever!
reviews.comment: Love the new update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: First place I go to figure out what is making my phone behavior different.
reviews.author: John Mark Wildenthal

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Finally fixed the issue with the notification bar not having enough space to fit temp, cpu and memory statistics. Great app!
reviews.author: Catalin Soare

reviews.title: Y
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Chris Robinson

reviews.title: Perfection!
reviews.comment: Best Android OS Monitor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Nice update from a dev that seemingly reads reviews here... So I m back on latest version.  1 request: I use a custom font and the processes icons are not ligning up vertically because of different process IDs characters (# and width). So that looks a little weird....  5 stars after that...heck, there they are anyway....  Thanks dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is by far the best app I have downloaded from the app store. It has every thing I wanted to help me better manage my device. Great work.
reviews.author: Samuel Johnson

reviews.title: can\'t get root
reviews.comment: when it requests root it just freezes and I never get a prompt to allow/deny it only works if I change the default to allow
reviews.author: David Rennie-Waldock

reviews.title: best CPU monitor
reviews.comment: This is the best CPU monitor I have seen so far, but I also like the fact that it monitors more than just one thing like a lot of other applications. Clean UI, gets the job done.
reviews.author: Justin Green

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Gives me all the os info I need
reviews.author: Tom Earnshaw

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It helps to know what is slowing down the phone
reviews.author: Keith Kratochvil

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This tool takes the user to the guts of the Android system. Plus it sports a clean, conscise and comprehensive interface. Couldn\'t be better!
reviews.author: Carlos Frederico Jeunon

reviews.title: strange cpu timing
reviews.comment: cpu frequency shows two cores jump together in frequency as if they are locked. in reality cores often run different frequencies and other monitoring programs show it correctly.
reviews.author: Anton X
